Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with direct dial phone, satellite TV, refrigerator, kitchenette with cooking facilities, safety box (on extra charge), balcony or terrace.

Hotel is located in Port Hersonissos, 50m from the beach and 150m from a sandy beach. Retail shops are just a 5 minute walk and the beach road is 10 minutes walk, 50m from the center of Hersonissos, 8km from the Crete Golf Club, 8km from Malia and 27km from Heraklion and the Heraklion Airport.
